text: Charles GrahamCharles Graham Ballantyne - Record vs Heart of Midlothian Ballantyne (30 August 1914 - 21 August 1991) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton and Clyde. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Clyde F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:1991 deaths Category:Association football central defenders Category:Sportspeople from Dumbarton
title: Charles Ballantyne (footballer)
